__e: My mom works all day for minimum wage, she takes classes at night, and she relies on house-sitting for a place to live,
So, you know, it's hard to find a guy with 20 years' experience who will work for minimum wage, so I got my old job back.
Minimum wage and the hours are shit and it's a least another 40 minutes away from here.
And I don't want the salary which comes in the middle of the month.
We don't do a big dinner train, but most girls are on call twice a week, 5:00 to 9:00, same wages as daytime.
It isn't easy for him to find somebody to work for the wages he pays you.
The pay is just okay, but the people are amazing.
The salary isn't amazing... more or less half of what I used to earn... three weeks of vacation a year, my boss is 15 years younger than me.
The salary's not much, but when you look at others, this is just fine.
But you know and I know that a detective's salary...
That's more money than your poor father ever earned in a whole year,
I wanted to be a teacher and she wanted something more than my teacher salary could provide.
I wonder if a man with five children earning less than £2 a week would agree with that?
Mm-hmm. And this guy's $40 million in salary last year is just the Earth's way of saying thank you.
